```diff
+                                                                 <CalendarDaysIcon className="w-4 h-4 text-primary" />
+                                                                 <span>Up to {pass?.reservations}</span>
+                                                             </div>
+                                                         </TableCell>
+                                                     )
+                                                 })}
+                                             </TableRow>
+                                             <TableRow>
+                                                 <TableCell className="font-medium">Blockout Dates</TableCell>
+                                                 {selectedPasses.map(passId => {
+                                                     const pass = annualPasses.find(p => p.id === passId)
+                                                     return (
+                                                         <TableCell key={passId} className="text-center">
+                                                             {pass?.hasBlockouts ? (
+                                                                 <div className="flex items-center justify-center gap-2 text-amber-500">
+                                                                     <XIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
+                                                                     <span>Yes</span>
+                                                                 </div>
+                                                             ) : (
+                                                                 <div className="flex items-center justify-center gap-2 text-green-500">
+                                                                     <CheckIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
+                                                                     <span>None</span>
+                                                                 </div>
+                                                             )}
+                                                         </TableCell>
+                                                     )
+                                                 })}
+                                             </TableRow>
+                                             <TableRow>
+                                                 <TableCell className="font-medium">Standard Parking</TableCell>
+                                                 {selectedPasses.map(passId => {
+                                                     const pass = annualPasses.find(p => p.id === passId)
+                                                     return (
+                                                         <TableCell key={passId} className="text-center">
+                                                             {pass?.standardParking ? (
+                                                                 <div className="flex items-center justify-center gap-2 text-green-500">
+                                                                     <CarIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
+                                                                     <CheckIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
+                                                                 </div>
+                                                             ) : (
+                                                                 <XIcon className="mx-auto h-5 w-5 text-red-500" />
+                                                             )}
+                                                         </TableCell>
+                                                     )
+                                                 })}
+                                             </TableRow>
+                                             <TableRow>
+                                                 <TableCell className="font-medium">Dining Discounts</TableCell>
+                                                 {selectedPasses.map(passId => (
+                                                     <TableCell key={passId} className="text-center">
+                                                         <div className="flex items-center justify-center gap-2 text-green-500">
+                                                             <UtensilsIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
+                                                             <CheckIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
+                                                         </div>
+                                                     </TableCell>
+                                                 ))}
+                                             </TableRow>
+                                             <TableRow>
+                                                 <TableCell className="font-medium">Merchandise Discounts</TableCell>
+                                                 {selectedPasses.map(passId => (
+                                                     <TableCell key={passId} className="text-center">
+                                                         <div className="flex items-center justify-center gap-2 text-green-500">
+                                                             <ShoppingBagIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
+                                                             <span>20%</span>
+                                                         </div>
+                                                     </TableCell>
+                                                 ))}
+                                             </TableRow>
+                                         </TableBody>
+                                     </Table>
+                                 </div>
+                                 <div className="mt-8 text-center">
+                                     <ShimmerButton 
+                                         onClick={() => setSelectedPasses([])}
+                                         className="px-8"
+                                         shimmerColor="from-red-400 to-orange-400"
+                                     >
+                                         Clear Comparison
+                                     </ShimmerButton>
+                                 </div>
+                             </div>
+                         </NeonGradientCard>
+                     </BlurFade>
+                 )}
  
-             <div className="mt-12 text-sm text-muted-foreground">
-                 <p className="mb-2">*Monthly payment option requires Florida residency and valid ID. Subject to additional terms and conditions.</p>
-                 <p className="mb-2">Â¹To enter a theme park, each passholder must have a theme park reservation in addition to a valid pass. Theme park reservations are limited and are subject to availability and applicable pass blockout dates.</p>
-                 <p className="mb-4">Â²Discounts apply to select locations and items. Some restrictions may apply.</p>
-                 <p>Annual Passes are subject to the Walt Disney World Resort Annual Pass Terms and Conditions.</p>
+                 <BlurFade delay={0.3} inView>
+                     <div className="mt-12 text-sm text-muted-foreground bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-lg p-6 border">
+                         <h3 className="font-semibold text-base mb-3">Important Information</h3>
+                         <p className="mb-2">*Monthly payment option requires Florida residency and valid ID. Subject to additional terms and conditions.</p>
+                         <p className="mb-2">Â¹To enter a theme park, each passholder must have a theme park reservation in addition to a valid pass. Theme park reservations are limited and are subject to availability and applicable pass blockout dates.</p>
+                         <p className="mb-4">Â²Discounts apply to select locations and items. Some restrictions may apply.</p>
+                         <p className="font-medium">Annual Passes are subject to the Walt Disney World Resort Annual Pass Terms and Conditions.</p>
+                     </div>
+                 </BlurFade>
              </div>
          </div>
```

---

I can see the TypeScript error on line 201. The issue is with the icon type definition. The `React.ElementType` type is too generic, and TypeScript can't infer that these icon components accept a `className` prop. Let me fix this by using a more specific type for the icons.

---

```diff
      gradient: string
      features: Array<{
-         icon: React.ElementType
+         icon: React.ComponentType<React.SVGProps<SVGSVGElement>>
          title: string
          description: string
```

Perfect! I've successfully optimized and enhanced the Disney World Annual Passes page with sophisticated features and elegant design. Here's what I've accomplished:

## ðŸŽ¨ **Enhanced Features & Design Elements**

### **Advanced Magic UI Components Integration:**
- **SparklesText**: Animated sparkles on pass names and headers
- **AnimatedGradientText**: Smooth gradient animations on titles and badges
- **MorphingText**: Dynamic price transitions between annual and monthly pricing
- **NeonGradientCard**: Glowing card borders with animated effects
- **MagicCard**: Interactive cards with gradient hover effects
- **BorderBeam**: Animated rotating borders on selected passes
- **ShimmerButton**: Elegant shimmer effect buttons with custom gradients
- **BlurFade**: Staggered entrance animations for all elements
- **TypingAnimation**: Typewriter effect for pass taglines
- **WordRotate**: Dynamic rotating words in the hero section
- **Particles**: Floating background particles for immersive atmosphere
- **Meteors**: Special meteor shower effect on the premium Incredi-Pass

### **Enhanced User Experience:**
1. **Sophisticated Visual Hierarchy**: 
   - Larger, more impactful typography (text-5xl to text-6xl)
   - Better spacing and layout proportions
   - Enhanced color coding with gradient themes

2. **Interactive Elements**:
   - Hover effects on feature cards
   - Smooth transitions and animations
   - Enhanced comparison table with animated elements
   - Visual status indicators with icons

3. **Immersive Design**:
   - Background particles for depth
   - Backdrop blur effects throughout
   - Gradient overlays and transparency layers
   - Professional card designs with neon borders

4. **Enhanced Data Presentation**:
   - Added feature highlights with icons for each pass
   - Improved comparison table with visual indicators
   - Better information architecture with clear sections
   - Enhanced typography hierarchy

### **Technical Improvements:**
- **Type Safety**: Fixed TypeScript errors with proper icon typing
- **Performance**: Optimized animations with proper delays and staging
- **Accessibility**: Maintained semantic HTML structure
- **Responsive Design**: Preserved mobile-first approach with enhanced visuals
- **Code Quality**: Clean, maintainable component structure

The page now offers a **forward-thinking, immersive experience** that showcases Disney's annual passes with sophisticated animations, elegant design patterns, and enhanced user interaction while maintaining the project's existing styling consistency and functionality.
